'''Electro Crystals''' can be found in the wild in various areas of [[Teyvat]]. They can be harvested by shattering [[Tourmaline]]s using {{Pyro}} attacks.

==How to Obtain==
The crystals can be mainly found in Mondstadt and Inazuma.

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=63 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
